title: Servotech Power Systems gets additional order to set up 9 EV charging stations in Maharashtra
description: Servotech Power Systems has received an additional order to install nine EV charging stations in Maharashtra. The new contract comes from Nashik Municipal Corporation. This will bring the total number of EV charging stations by the company to 29. Previously, Servotech had a contract to install 20 EV charging stations for Nashik Municipal Corporation.
